name: Deep in the Space
description:
Bullet hell in space, defeat 2 bosses and save the galaxy.

Control:

W,A,S,D - Moving

Space - Shooting

R - Restart

Esc - Main Menu

Sound Directing and Composing: Chronomic https://chronomic.wixsite.com/chronicles

Art Direction: Tereza Maděrová https://temaderova.wixsite.com/portfolio
